title: Mordekaiser (and his enemies) can ward outside of the boundary of his R.
body: Mordekaiser (and I'm assuming the enemy champion you ult.) can ward outside of his ult boundary. If you didn't know how Morde's R and ward interact, if a ward is in Morde's realm, people from SR won't see it, and vice versa. Anyways, I was just wondering if this was intentional or not, [pic here](https://gyazo.com/6c6f215ead828d9214232059093d6b87)

replies.body: Also, the location marker of the training dummies won't be affected by rift herald or drake moving it.

Now see if this applies to farsight lmao.

I am glad to see riot retained a core part of his identity through the rework, though.
